How to Give Polaroid Effects Everywhere You Like !!!

May 18, 2012 • Franklin Antony

Photos taken very interesting as they are given some top and unique style.It enhances the great perspectives.Here comes the importance of Polaroid  Photos.
Today I’m going to show various methods by which you can obtain this ‘Polaroid ‘Effect.
*Example.


#1 Polaroid Effect in your PC[Offline]


You can download this software provided by poladroid.net.
Download it Here

#2 Polaroid Effect Online



There are various Websites which provide this function with Hostin[Also sharing]
I had a look through these sites. Theses sites have an astounding-collection of wonderful image-effects. Once you choose a pic and upload an image, they polarize-image[Or gives other] !! When  done, download or upload it to your other accounts!
All you need to do is upload - crop image, - put some text - choose a frame - vignette option and polarize-image!

Create Polaroid photo effect Online at

a) Rollip
b)Polaroin
c)Piknik
d)Genki
e)Drpic
d)Photonotes
e)Instantizer
f)BlinkYou

#3 Polaroid Effect in Your blogs/Sites


You can Add Polaroid’s style picture to your blog/site with a simple WLW Plug-in. The plug-in allow to tilt Polaroid(Polaroided) pic in any direction and  add a text caption.
You can download it Here


#4 Polaroid Effect in Adobe Photoshop[Vintage Effect]


The following video tutorial shows how to apply polaroid-effect in photo-shop




#5 Polaroid Effect in Your PowerPoint Presentations


Here is another video tutorial!
The following video tutorial shows how to apply polaroid-effect  with image-editing tool available in PowerPoint.

 

If you know any other effects please do-share in comments!!!
